segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman looks while everything around her is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she’s just standing there drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to tip over, and she hasn’t even turned around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to stop before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and the floor is going to be a slippery mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how much longer this can go on before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a disaster, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR
